_description: Master roster of all agents to be registered on-chain

agents.name: Web3 Agent
agents.description: Morpheus ecosystem specialist. Decentralized inference, MOR token strategy, node operations, and Web3 infrastructure.

agents.name: Agentic AI Agent
agents.description: Agentic AI development lead. EverClaw skill ecosystem, 28 flavors, ClawHub, OpenClaw configuration, and agent infrastructure.

agents.name: Corporate Agent
agents.description: Corporate and enterprise operations. Based AI commercial layer, enterprise partnerships, and business development.

agents.name: Advisor Agent
agents.description: External advisory agent. Supports advisory work with external projects, due diligence, strategy consulting, and partnership evaluation.

agents.name: David Agent
agents.description: Public-facing David clone. Trained on historical emails and public knowledge to represent the user's voice, tone, and perspective in public discussions.

agents.name: David Personal Agent
agents.description: the user's personal AI assistant. Calendar, family coordination, personal tasks.
